text: Montredon-Labessonnie is a commune in the Tarn department in southern France. The commune has several shops, a planetarium, a cinema, a tourist information centre, a hotel, cafe-bars among other venues. a wide range of houses for rent, for example: La Payrastrie. ==Geography== The commune is traversed by the river Dadou. ==See also== *Communes of the Tarn department ==References== *INSEE Category:Communes of Tarn (department)
title: Montredon-Labessonnié
